Acceptance criteria

  • remove /eater routes (put them as DEFAULT one)
  • DEFAULT routes can be accessed by user with role EATER only
  • /foodlord rout can be accessed by user with role FOODLORD only
  • /settings page is not restricted in access

Acceptance criteria

  • user is authenticated by JWT token
  • two Roles are available: EATER, FOODLORD
  • Only users with the appropriate role can access endpoints
  • service manages required Roles on authorization service automatically on start

  • settings

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Vitalii Dmytruk"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"nnovoselska"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"vdmytruk"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1571146634240"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"LR-184","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Sprints","value":["9"],"valueId":["9"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Ideal days","value":["1"],"valueId":["1"],"color":null}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-138","entityId":"2-295","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Display weekly menu preview before publishing it"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Deleted User"},{"name":"created","value":"1566394310086"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"138"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a user, I want to be able to see a preview modal with a list of all dishes selected for every day of the weekly menu.

Acceptance criteria

  • Clicking "Publish" shows a modal with a preview of the current weekly menu and two buttons on the bottom: "Publish" and "Cancel"
  • Clicking "Publish" publishes the menu
  • Clicking "Cancel" closes the modal
  • List of dishes is scrollable, while buttons are always displayed on the bottom of modal
